sentence: The Michigan Court of Appeals has unanimously rejected a legal challenge from Perry Johnson, a former leading GOP candidate for Michigan governor, who was one of five Republicans disqualified from the ballot because of invalid signatures on their nominating petitions.

sentence: Oakland County businessman and GOP gubernatorial hopeful Perry Johnson should not appear on the ballot for the upcoming August primary election, the Michigan Court of Appeals ruled Wednesday.
